cause.description:
This cause goes out towards poor helpless animals who are being abused for no possible reason because they cannot fight for their rites and we as people should say no and help den back in return.
Remember: You can help animals everywhere by joining PETA's Action Team today: http://bit.ly/action-team.
1. Animals are precious jus as ppl are stop d abuse
cause.mission: To help poor animals being abused
cause.name: Stop abusing animals
